bibl.title: Letter from R.H. Freyberg to Philip Showalter Hench, December 11, 1941

div1.p: Freyberg thanks Hench for a reprint of "The Conquerors of Yellow Fever."

div1.head: Letter from R.H. Freyberg to Philip Showalter Hench, December 11, 1941
div1.opener:
list.
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL
ANN ARBOR
December 11, 1941
Y F.
RACKMAM ARTHRITIS RESEARCH UNIT
RICHARD H. FREYBERG, M.D.
ASSISTANT PROFESSOR OF MEDICINE
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
I have just received the reprint “Conquerors of Yellow Fever.” I enjoyed
reading this tremendously. I am anxious to hear more about your own
conquest in this regard either privately or publicly and hope I have the
opportunity to do so soon. Thanks again.
div1.closer: Sincerely, R. H. Freyberg, M.D. RHF:eb
